description: If you have difficulty falling asleep, listen and watch this video, and you will be ready to sleep deeply, and have a restful sleep. Sounds and Images to Relax and Sleep Like a Baby Sound of mother nature that gives you peace and tranquility for a restful sleep of more than 8 hours. The more you give the more you receive is a way to generate abundance.  Dolphin and whale sounds and music to sleep soundly for more than 8 hours. To continue supporting you, your donation is important. https://paypal.me/feraury?locale.x=es_XC The more you give the more you receive Infinite thanks for your contribution to this potdcas Only by this means.
html_description:
If you have difficulty falling asleep, listen and watch this video, and you will be ready to sleep deeply, and have a restful sleep.


Sounds and Images to Relax and Sleep Like a Baby


Sound of mother nature that gives you peace and tranquility for a restful sleep of more than 8 hours.


The more you give the more you receive is a way to generate abundance.


Dolphin and whale sounds and music to sleep soundly for more than 8 hours.


To continue supporting you, your donation is important.


https://paypal.me/feraury?locale.x=es_XC


The more you give the more you receive


Infinite thanks for your contribution to this potdcas


Only by this means.
name: Sleep soundly for more than 8 hours.

show.description: You can achieve anything you want by changing your mental habits... Today I share some positive actions that will lead us to make great changes in our lives. Let's do some general cleaning to learn to live in a different way.
show.html_description:

Today I share some positive actions that will lead us to make great changes in our lives.
Let's do some general cleaning to learn to live in a different way.
show.name: Cambia Tu Mente Y Podrás Cambiar Tu Vida
